-1.title: L.A. Times - Enjoy Your Life (Freerunning and Parkour)
-1.plot: It's about the journey not the destination. So many facets of life go unappreciated and unexplored. We fear the consequences of our actions even when the reward is happiness. From simple decisions to important relationships we don't always allow ourselves the opportunity to fully appreciate them until they are gone. Life is meant for living, weather your on a grand adventure or taking a walk through the neighborhood, so take a second to appreciate the air we breathe, the sights we can see, and the relationships we have. Happiness is a choice and it is up to you to ...

locations: San Pedro, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Elevated is a high concept Freerunning series from the minds of World Champion Freerunners, Jesse La Flair and Cory DeMeyers. Follow them on an epic adventure as they move through 4 unique environments, pushing the limits of action sports cinematography, testing their boundaries, and Elevating their sport through original and creative movement.
imdb.title: Elevated
plot: _Elevated_ (qv) is a high concept Freerunning series from the minds of World Champion Freerunners, Jesse La Flair and Cory DeMeyers. Follow them on an epic adventure as they move through 4 unique environments, pushing the limits of action sports cinematography, testing their boundaries, and Elevating their sport through original and creative movement.::Cory DeMeyers
